original_definition: 'interruptible services' means services offered by the transmission system operator in relation to interruptible capacity;
generated_definition: 'interruptible services' means transmissionsystem operators shall offer firm and interruptible services down to a minimum period of one day.

Article\u00a02: ‘interruptible services’ means services offered by the transmission system operator in relation to interruptible capacity;
Article\u00a032: 1.Transmissionsystem operators shall offer firm andinterruptible services down to a minimum period of one day.
1.   Transmission system operators shall offer firm and interruptible services down to a minimum period of one day.
